description: After completing this Project, you can change your specialization to "Grovetender".\n\nGrovetenders take great pride in their Herbling companions, strongly preferring to focus the bulk of their efforts on this prized creature over all the others. This peculiar mage knows just the right techniques to bring out her Herbling's full potential as it transforms rapidly in combat to wreak havoc on its foes.
name: Specialization: Grovetender
